Verses: 1 paavaththode Paavaththaik Koottumpadi, Ennai Allaamal Aalosanaipanni, En Aaviyai Allaamal Thangalai Moodikkollap Paarkkiravargalum,

2 en Vaakkaik Kelaamal Paarvonin Belaththinaale Belakkavum, Egipthin Nizhalile Odhungavum Vendum Endru Egipthukkup Pogiravargalumaagiya Murattaattamulla Puththirarukku Aiyo! Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
3 paarvonudaiya Belan Ungalukku Vetkamaagavum Egipthinudaiya Nizhalodhukku Ungalukku Lachchaiyaagavum Irukkum.
4 avargal Prabukkal Sovaanile Poi Avargal Sthaanaapadhigal Aanesmattum Serugiraargal.
5 aanaalum Thangal Sagaayaththukkum Prayojanaththukkum Udhavaamal, Vetkaththukkum Nindhaikkume Udhavum Janaththinaale Yaavarum Vetkappaduvaargal.

6 therkepogira Mirugajeevangalin Baaram. Dthushtasingamum, Kizhachchingamum, Viriyanum, Parakkira Kollivaaichcharppamum Varugiradhum, Nerukkamum Idukkamum Adaivikkiradhumaana Dhesaththukku, Avargal Kazhudhai Marigaludaiya Mudhuginmel Thangal Aasthigalaiyum, Ottagangaludaiya Mudhuginmel Thangal Pokkishangalaiyum, Thangalukku Udhavaadha Janaththandaikku Etrikkondupogiraargal.
7 egipthiyar Sagaayampannuvadhu Viyarththamum Veenumaam; Aagaiyaal, Summaayiruppadhe Avargalukku Belan Endru Adharkaagak Koorugiren.
8 ippozhudhu Nee Poi, Idhu Pirkaalaththukku Endrendraikkum Irukkumpadi, Idhai Avargalukku Munbaaga Oru Palagaiyil Ezhudhi, Oru Pusthagaththil Varai.
9 ivargal Kalagamulla Janangalum, Poipesugira Pillaigalum, Karththarudaiya Vedhaththaik Ketka Manadhillaadha Puththirarumaayirukkiraargal.

10 ivargal Dharisanakkaararai Nokki: Dharisanan Kaanavendaam Endrum, Gnaanadhirushtikkaararai Nokki: Yadhaarththamaai Engalukku Dharisananchollaamal Engalukku Idhamaana Sorkalai Uraiththu, Maayamaanavaigalai Dhrushtiyungal Endrum,
11 neengal Vazhiyai Vittu, Paadhaiyinindru Vilagi, Isravelin Parisuththarai Engal Munbaaga Iraamal Oyappannungal Endrum Sollugiraargal.
12 neengal Indha Vaarththaiyai Veruththu, Idukkamum Thaarumaarum Seygiradhai Nambi, Adhai Saarndhukollugirapadiyaal,
13 indha Akkiramam Ungalukku Uyarththa Suvaril Vizhap Pidhunginirkiradhum, Thideerendru Sadidhiyaai Idiyap Pogiradhumaana Vedippaippola Irukkum Endru Isravelin Parisuththar Sollugiraar.

14 avargalai Avar Thappavidaamal Udaiyumpadi Kuyakkalaththai Norukkuvadhupola Avargalai Norukkuvaar; Aduppile Neruppu Edukkiradharkum, Kulaththile Thanneer Mollugiradharkum Norungina Thundugalil, Oru Odaagilum Adappadaadhepom.

15 neengal Mananthirumbi Amarndhirundhaal Ratchikkappaduveergal; Amarikkaiyum Nambikkaiyume Ungal Belanaayirukkum Endru Isravelin Parisuththaraayirukkira Karththaraagiya Dhevan Sollugiraar; Neengalo Appadi Seyya Manadhaayiraamal;

16 appadiyalla, Kudhiraigalinmel Eri Odippovom Engireergal; Appadiye Odippoveergal, Vegamaana Vaaganangalinmel Erippovom Engireergal; Appadiye Ungalaith Thuraththugiravargal Vegamaaiththuraththuvaargal.
17 neengal Malaiyuchchiyinmel Oru Kambaththaippolavum, Mettinmel Oru Kodiyaippolavum Meendhirukkumattaaga, Oruvan Bayamuruththa Aayiramperum, Aindhuper Bayamuruththa Neengal Anaivarum Odippoveergal.
18 aanaalum Ungalukku Irangumpadi Karththar Kaaththiruppaar, Ungalmel Manadhurugumpadi Ezhundhiruppaar; Karththar Needhiseygira Dhevan; Avarukkuk Kaaththirukkira Anaivarum Baakkiyavaangal.
19 seeyonai Serndha Janangal Erusalemil Vaasamaayiruppaargal; Ini Nee Azhudhukondiraai; Un Kooppidudhalin Saththaththukku Avar Urukkamaai Irangi Adhaik Kettavudane Unakku Maruuththaravu Aruluvaar.
20 aandavar Ungalukkuth Thunbaththin Appaththaiyum, Ubaththiravaththin Thanneeraiyum Koduththaalum, Un Podhagargal Ini Orupodhum Maraindhirukkamaattaargal; Un Kangal Un Podhagargalaik Kaanum.
21 neengal Valadhupuramaai Saayumpodhum, Idadhupuramaai Saayumpodhum: Vazhi Idhuve, Idhile Nadavungal Endru Ungalukkup Pinnaale Sollum Vaarththaiyai Ungal Kaadhugal Ketkum.
22 un Suroobangalai Moodiya Velliththagattaiyum, Un Vikkiragangalin Pon Aadaiyaabaranaththaiyum Theettaaga Enni, Avaigalaith Theettuppatta Vasthirampola Erindhuvittu, Adhai See! Po Enbaai.

23 appozhudhu Nee Nilaththil Vidhaikkum Un Vidhaikku Avar Mazhaiyaiyum, Nilaththin Palanaagiya Aagaaraththaiyum Tharuvaar; Adhu Kozhumaiyum Pushtiyumaai Irukkum; Akkaalaththile Un Aadumaadugal Visthaaramaana Meychchalulla Sthalaththile Meyum.
24 nilaththai Uzhugira Erudhugalum Kazhudhaimarigalum, Muraththinaalum Thootrukkoodaiyinaalum Thootrappatta Rusiyulla Kappigalaith Thinnum.
25 koburangal Vizhugira Magaa Sangaaraththin Naalile Uyaramaana Sagala Malaigalinmelum, Uyaramaana Sagalamedugalinmelum Aarugalum Vaaikkaalgalum Undaagum.

26 karththar Thamadhu Janaththin Murivaik Katti, Adhin Adikkaayaththai Gunamaakkum Naalile, Sandhiranudaiya Velichcham Sooriyanudaiya Velichchaththaippolavum, Sooriyanudaiya Velichcham Ezhaththanaiyaai Ezhu Pagalin Velichchaththaippolavum Irukkum.

27 idho, Karththarudaiya Naamam Dhooraththilirundhu Varum; Avarudaiya Kobam Erigiradhum Kanandru Pugaigiradhumaayirukkum; Avarudaiya Udhadugal Sinaththaal Niraindhu, Avarudaiya Naavu Patchikkira Akkinipola Irukkum.

28 naasam Ennum Salladaiyile Jaadhigalai Arikkumpadikku Avar Oodhum Suvaasam Kazhuththumattum Ettugira Aatruvellaththaippolavum, Janangaludaiya Vaayilepottu Alaikkazhikkira Kadivaalaththaippolavum Irukkum.

29 pandigai Aasarikkappadum Raaththiriyile Paadugiradhupolap Paaduveergal; Karththarudaiya Parvadhamaagiya Isravelin Kanmalaiyandaikkuppoga Naagasuraththode Nadandhuvarugirapodhu Magizhugiradhupola Magizhveergal.

30 karththar Magaththuvamaanavar; Thamadhu Saththaththaik Ketkappanni, Ukkira Kobaththinaalum, Patchikkira Akkinijuvaalaiyinaalum, Idi Peruvellam Kalmazhaiyinaalum, Thamadhu Buyaththin Vallamaiyaik Kaanbippaar.
31 appozhudhu Thandaayudhaththinaal Adiththa Aseeriyan Karththarudaiya Saththaththinaale Norungundupovaan.
32 karththar Avanmel Sumaththum Aakkinaiththandam Sellumidamengum Melangalum Veenaigalum Adhinudan Pogum; Kodiya Yuththangalinaal Avanai Edhirththu Yuththancheyvaar.

33 thoppedh Erkanave Erpaduththappattadhu; Raajaavukku Adhu Aayaththappaduththappattadhu; Adhai Aazhamum Visaalamumaakkinaar; Vegumpadi Akkiniyum Migundha Viragumundu; Karththarin Suvaasam Kandhagath Theeyaippola Adhaik Koluththum.
